cause.description:
"Mayor Wilson is sponsoring an initiative to replace that clock. 52 years ago lightning struck that clock tower and the clock hasn't run since. We at the Hill Valley Preservation Society think it should be preserved exactly the way it is, as a part of our history and heritage...don't forget to take a flyer."
1. Because back to the future is one of the greatest movies ever
2. and of course we want to save the clock tower
cause.name: Save The Clock Tower
